name: buldy
description: Modern CSS framework distilled from the best of larger frameworks

scripts.build: npm run css-compile && npm run css-minify
scripts.css-compile: sass --no-source-map scss/buldy.scss dist/buldy.css && sass --no-source-map scss/components/raster.scss dist/raster.css
scripts.css-minify: cleancss --level 1 --output dist/buldy.min.css dist/buldy.css && cleancss --level 1 --output dist/raster.min.css dist/raster.css
